name: Fate of Factions
description:
**Fate of Factions is a controller based game!**

Fate of Factions is a 2-4 player free-for-all arena fighting game! Each player chooses from four unique classes: Warrior, Rogue, Ranger, or Mage. Every class has potential to be played in a variety of different ways. Use each character in vastly different arenas to fight until the whole realm is flying your faction’s banner!

*You can launch the game and "play" as one person, but you cannot fully play the game without 2-4 players*

Known Bugs:

Credits cannot be left except for quitting and relaunching the game

Thank you for playing!

The Fifth Faction
